list_definition.definition: a person or thing that directs, eg one of a group of persons who manage the affairs of a business or a person who is in charge of the making of a film, play etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is on the board of directors of our firm
The producer and the director quarrelled about the film.
